bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names shao yin zheng 少陰證 , minor yin pathological condition. Pathological Condition in a later phase of harm caused by cold disease brought forth by harm to the proper qi, a weakening of the disease qi, and an exhaustion of the entire body. Shang han lun 傷寒論 285: 少陰病，脈細沉數，病為在裏，不可發汗 , “A minor yin disease : the [movement in the] vessels is fine and deep inside. The disease is in the interior. One must not cause sweating”.
